value.name: The Latest: Deaf man killed by NC trooper had police record
value.description: CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP ... A review by The Associated Press shows 29-year-old Daniel Kevin Harris had traffic stops in Denver, Colorado, in 2015 and 2008. The five misdemeanor charges filed ...

value.name: Police: Driver killed by NC trooper was hearing impaired
value.description: The report by the Charlotte-Mecklenburg police provides no other details on the impairment of the 29-year-old driver, identified by the State Bureau of Investigation as Daniel Kevin Harris.

value.name: Deadly shooting of deaf driver by state trooper stirs controversy
value.description: In North Carolina, an investigation is underway into the deadly shooting of Daniel Kevin Harris by a state trooper. The incident occurred in Charlotte after an attempted traffic stop, but what ...
